result.eng: The men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ga: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.orig: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.html: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.

result.eng: And here comes the man himself.
result.ga: Agus seo chugainn an fear féin
result.orig: Agus seo chugainn an fear féin
result.html: Agus seo chugainn an fear féinAnd here comes the man himself.
result.ponchtml: Agus seo ċugainn an fear féinAnd here comes the man himself.

result.eng: I saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ga: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.orig: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.html: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromthaI saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé an seanḟear boċt cromṫaI saw the poor old stooping man.

result.eng: Both men and women were there.
result.ga: Bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.orig: Bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.html: Bhí idir fhir agus mhná annBoth men and women were there.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí idir ḟir agus ṁná annBoth men and women were there.

result.eng: The men were able to work hard.
result.ga: Bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.orig: Bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.html: Bhí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.

result.eng: Two men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ga: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.orig: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.html: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ beirt ḟear fiċe bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.

result.eng: The man with the hat.
result.ga: Fear an hata
result.orig: Fear an hata
result.html: Fear an hataThe man with the hat.
result.ponchtml: Fear an hataThe man with the hat.

result.eng: A man I know.
result.ga: Fear atá ar m'aithne
result.orig: Fear atá ar m'aithne
result.html: Fear atá ar m'aithneA man I know.
result.ponchtml: Fear atá ar m'aiṫneA man I know.

result.eng: The man with the beard.
result.ga: Fear na féasóige
result.orig: Fear na féasóige
result.html: Fear na féasóigeThe man with the beard.
result.ponchtml: Fear na féasóigeThe man with the beard.

result.eng: Some other man.
result.ga: Fear éigin eile
result.orig: Fear éigin eile
result.html: Fear éigin eileSome other man.
result.ponchtml: Fear éigin eileSome other man.

result.eng: My husband has been gone for a long time.
result.ga: Is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaim
result.orig: Is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaim
result.html: Is fada m'fhear céile imithe uaimMy husband has been gone for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Is fada m'ḟear céile imiṫe uaimMy husband has been gone for a long time.

result.eng: He's a tall man.
result.ga: Is fear ard é
result.orig: Is fear ard é
result.html: Is fear ard éHe's a tall man.
result.ponchtml: Is fear ard éHe's a tall man.

result.eng: He's a handsome man.
result.ga: Is fear dathúil é
result.orig: Is fear dathúil é
result.html: Is fear dathúil éHe's a handsome man.
result.ponchtml: Is fear daṫúil éHe's a handsome man.

result.eng: He's very outgoing.
result.ga: Is fear mór cuideachta é
result.orig: Is fear mór cuideachta é
result.html: Is fear mór cuideachta éHe's very outgoing.
result.ponchtml: Is fear mór cuideaċta éHe's very outgoing.

result.eng: Two men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ga: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.orig: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.html: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimheTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ponchtml: Leag beirt ḟear go talaṁ í agus ġoid siad a mála láiṁeTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.

result.eng: She has no interest in men.
result.ga: Níl aon suim aici sna fir
result.orig: Níl aon suim aici sna fir
result.html: Níl aon suim aici sna firShe has no interest in men.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon suim aici sna firShe has no interest in men.

result.eng: She married a rich man.
result.ga: Phós sí fear saibhir
result.orig: Phós sí fear saibhir
result.html: Phós sí fear saibhirShe married a rich man.
result.ponchtml: Ṗós sí fear saiḃirShe married a rich man.

result.eng: She married an old man.
result.ga: Phós sí seanfhear
result.orig: Phós sí seanfhear
result.html: Phós sí seanfhearShe married an old man.
result.ponchtml: Ṗós sí seanḟearShe married an old man.

result.eng: Pint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}
result.ga: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fear
result.orig: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fear
result.html: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fearPint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}
result.ponchtml: Pionta Guinness le do ṫoil - Seo duit - Maiṫ an fearPint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}

result.eng: This is my husband.
result.ga: Seo m'fhear céile
result.orig: Seo m'fhear céile
result.html: Seo m'fhear céileThis is my husband.
result.ponchtml: Seo m'ḟear céileThis is my husband.

result.eng: She fell in love with a married man.
result.ga: Thit sí i ngrá le fear pósta
result.orig: Thit sí i ngrá le fear pósta
result.html: Thit sí i ngrá le fear póstaShe fell in love with a married man.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit sí i ngrá le fear póstaShe fell in love with a married man.

result.eng: This single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ga: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.orig: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.html: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadhThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósaḋThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.

result.eng: The number of men who are teachers is decreasing.
result.ga: Tá líon na bhfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laghad
result.orig: Tá líon na bhfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laghad
result.html: Tá líon na bhfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laghadThe number of men who are teachers is decreasing.
result.ponchtml: Tá líon na ḃfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laġadThe number of men who are teachers is decreasing.

result.eng: This man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ga: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.orig: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seo
result.html: Tá teach carr agus a lán airgid ag an fhear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.
result.ponchtml: Tá teaċ carr agus a lán airgid ag an ḟear seoThis man has a house, a car and a lot of money.

result.eng: Prepare your men for war.
result.ga: Ullmhaigh do chuid fear chun cogaidh
result.orig: Ullmhaigh do chuid fear chun cogaidh
result.html: Ullmhaigh do chuid fear chun cogaidhPrepare your men for war.
result.ponchtml: Ullṁaiġ do ċuid fear ċun cogaiḋPrepare your men for war.

result.eng: He is a widower.
result.ga: Is baintreach fir é
result.orig: Is baintreach fir é
result.html: Is baintreach fir éHe is a widower.
result.ponchtml: Is baintreaċ fir éHe is a widower.

result.eng: Is your husband with you in An Spidéal?
result.ga: An bhfuil d'fhear céile libh sa Spidéal
result.orig: An bhfuil d'fhear céile libh sa Spidéal
result.html: An bhfuil d'fhear céile libh sa SpidéalIs your husband with you in An Spidéal?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil d'ḟear céile liḃ sa SpidéalIs your husband with you in An Spidéal?

result.eng: My husband died two years ago.
result.ga: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.orig: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.html: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shinMy husband died two years ago.
result.ponchtml: Fuair m'ḟear céile bás ḋá ḃliain ó ẛinMy husband died two years ago.

result.eng: My husband is from Ros Muc.
result.ga: Is as Ros Muc m'fhear
result.orig: Is as Ros Muc m'fhear
result.html: Is as Ros Muc m'fhearMy husband is from Ros Muc.
result.ponchtml: Is as Ros Muc m'ḟearMy husband is from Ros Muc.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: My husband is unemployed at present.
result.ga: Tá m'fhear dífhostaithe faoi láthair
result.orig: Tá m'fhear dífhostaithe faoi láthair
result.html: Tá m'fhear dífhostaithe faoi láthairMy husband is unemployed at present.
result.ponchtml: Tá m'ḟear díḟostaiṫe faoi láṫairMy husband is unemployed at present.

result.eng: Her husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ga: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.orig: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.html: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ponchtml: Cailleaḋ a fear céile go tobann anuraiḋ beannaċt Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: The man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ga: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.orig: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.html: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ponchtml: Ḃrúiġ an fear a ẛrón in aġaiḋ na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.

result.eng: This is Seán's best man.
result.ga: Seo an fear atá ag seasamh le Seán
result.orig: Seo an fear atá ag seasamh le Seán
result.html: Seo an fear atá ag seasamh le SeánThis is Seán's best man.
result.ponchtml: Seo an fear atá ag seasaṁ le SeánThis is Seán's best man.

result.eng: The Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ga: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.orig: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.html: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ponchtml: Rinne na Naitsiṫe ár uafásaċ ar ḟir an ḃaile mar ḋíoltas ar ġníoṁarṫa Ḟriṫḃeartaíoċt na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.

result.eng: To wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ga: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.orig: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.html: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ponchtml: Cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mór go háiriṫe ar ṫíorṫa a raiḃ ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú Meán Foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do Ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.

result.eng: "Don't do it," the man said.
result.ga: Ná déan a dúirt an fear
result.orig: Ná déan a dúirt an fear
result.html: Ná déan a dúirt an fear"Don't do it," the man said.
result.ponchtml: Ná déan a dúirt an fear"Don't do it," the man said.

result.eng: At that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ga: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.orig: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.html: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ponchtml: Leis sin isteaċ le fear an tí agus cuma scaollṁar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.

result.eng: That man was only joking.
result.ga: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinn
result.orig: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinn
result.html: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinnThat man was only joking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ an fear sin aċ ar ẛon grinnThat man was only joking.

result.eng: The man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ga: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.orig: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.html: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anochtThe man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ponchtml: Tá braon ar bord ag an ḟear anoċtThe man has a drink taken tonight.

result.eng: The man got a college education.
result.ga: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláiste
result.orig: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláiste
result.html: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláisteThe man got a college education.
result.ponchtml: Fuair an fear foġlaim coláisteThe man got a college education.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: D'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.

result.eng: Wasn't he man enough?
result.ga: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.orig: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.html: Nach raibh go leor den fhear annWasn't he man enough?
result.ponchtml: Naċ raiḃ go leor den ḟear annWasn't he man enough?
